content.raw:
On joint construction, offsets were defined between Gazebo Links and Simbody MobilizedBody:

  * [screw joint `R_JZ`](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/f5c4bd7da4d23eba2d1f382341ae5e80e8991930/gazebo/physics/simbody/SimbodyPhysics.cc?at=simbody#cl-812)
  * [universal joint `R_JF`](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/f5c4bd7da4d23eba2d1f382341ae5e80e8991930/gazebo/physics/simbody/SimbodyPhysics.cc?at=simbody#cl-860)
  * [revolute joint `R_JZ`](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/f5c4bd7da4d23eba2d1f382341ae5e80e8991930/gazebo/physics/simbody/SimbodyPhysics.cc?at=simbody#cl-907)
  * [prismatic joint `R_JX`](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/f5c4bd7da4d23eba2d1f382341ae5e80e8991930/gazebo/physics/simbody/SimbodyPhysics.cc?at=simbody#cl-947)

So when `Entity::SetWorldPose` propagates down to `SimbodyLink::OnPoseChange`, [call to `setQToFitTransform`](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/f5c4bd7da4d23eba2d1f382341ae5e80e8991930/gazebo/physics/simbody/SimbodyLink.cc?at=simbody#cl-209) need to apply initial rotations to target poses?
content.html:
On joint construction, offsets were defined between Gazebo Links and Simbody MobilizedBody:

  • screw joint R_JZ
  • universal joint R_JF
  • revolute joint R_JZ
  • prismatic joint R_JX

So when Entity::SetWorldPose propagates down to SimbodyLink::OnPoseChange, call to setQToFitTransform need to apply initial rotations to target poses?
